briefTitle: Peanut Allergy Oral Immunotherapy Study of AR101 for Desensitization in Children and Adults (PALISADE)
officialTitle: Peanut Allergy Oral Immunotherapy Study of AR101 for Desensitization in Children and Adults (PALISADE)

interventions.name: AR101 powder provided in capsules & sachets
Placebo powder provided in capsules & sachets

arms.label: AR101 powder provided in capsules & sachets
Placebo powder provided in capsules & sachets

summary: The purpose of this study is to demonstrate the efficacy and safety of AR101 through reduction in clinical reactivity to peanut allergen in peanut-allergic children and adults.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Subjects Ages 4-17 Who Tolerated a Single Highest Dose of at Least 600 mg in the Exit Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled Food Challenge (DBPCFC)
